# this is the build file for project 
# it is autogenerated by the xmake build system.
# do not edit by hand.

# project
cmake_minimum_required(VERSION 3.15.0)
cmake_policy(SET CMP0091 NEW)
project(breakout LANGUAGES CXX C)

set(CAMKE_CXX_STANDARD 20)
# target
add_executable(breakout "")
set_target_properties(breakout PROPERTIES OUTPUT_NAME "breakout")
set_target_properties(breakout PROPERTIES RUNTIME_OUTPUT_DIRECTORY "${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/bin")
add_dependencies(breakout m_log)
target_include_directories(breakout PRIVATE
    m_log
    include
)
target_include_directories(breakout PRIVATE
    /home/kali/.xmake/packages/g/glfw/3.3.8/aa037e96cc854680a09e144c4b5c8fe0/include

    /home/kali/.xmake/packages/g/glad/v0.1.36/dd6f7de88060486a93ea896ea2b462ea/lib

    /home/kali/.xmake/packages/g/gtest/1.12.1/77b9096bc4b34d9282f672d36b015ba9/lib
    bin
)
target_link_options(test PRIVATE
    -m64
)
target_sources(test PRIVATE
    test/main.cpp
    test/path.cc
    test/destruct.cc
    test/log.cc
    test/load_level_test.cc
)
